testcase.name: crawlPageShopProducts

error.message:
### Error updating database. Cause: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.exceptions.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 982 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 1,030 milliseconds ago. ### The error may exist in com/tester/dao/TestResultDao.java (best guess) ### The error may involve com.tester.dao.TestResultDao.insertResult-Inline ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: INSERT INTO test_result(item,code, start_time,result,url,method,response) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?,?,?,?) ### Cause: com.mysql.cj.jdbc.exceptions.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 982 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 1,030 milliseconds ago. ; Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 982 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 1,030 milliseconds ago.; nested exception is com.mysql.cj.jdbc.exceptions.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 982 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 1,030 milliseconds ago.
